519195586512568300,Mon Oct 06 18:40:48 +0000 2014,.@MrLukeGorgeous Yeah he's awesome, so is my grandad #IMDbDracula
519195387232780300,Mon Oct 06 18:40:01 +0000 2014,RT @IMDb: Vlad is a wonderful father, where did you find the inspiration? With your own father? @MrLukeGorgeous @TheRealLukevans #IMDbDracu‚Ä¶
519195111239204860,Mon Oct 06 18:38:55 +0000 2014,.@lokitaxmagneto1 best has to be that he can turn into bats and the worst is that he has to live forever alone #IMDbDracula
519194738549739500,Mon Oct 06 18:37:26 +0000 2014,RT @IMDb: In your opinion...Which is the best quality of Dracula? and the worst?  @lokitaxmagneto1 @TheRealLukevans #IMDbDracula
519194409561116700,Mon Oct 06 18:36:08 +0000 2014,.@koa0112 Bonfires in my garden, annoying the neighbors, my mates and going to my local pub #IMDbDracula
519194028911235100,Mon Oct 06 18:34:37 +0000 2014,RT @IMDb: Spending time to shoot in Ireland about 4 months, what did you miss most? @koa0112 @TheRealLukevans @SarahGadon #IMDbDracula
519193602690662400,Mon Oct 06 18:32:55 +0000 2014,.@NuraKaber I watched a lot of documentaries, read a lot of biographies on Vlad and listened to Kasabian... :) #IMDbDracula
519193262792658940,Mon Oct 06 18:31:34 +0000 2014,RT @IMDb: What did you do to prepare yourselves for your character?Any special literature, songs? @NuraKaber @TheRealLukevans @SarahGadon #‚Ä¶
519192904552943600,Mon Oct 06 18:30:09 +0000 2014,.@AmberMaher a sense of responsibility and honour taking on such a famous role but putting my refreshing take on it #IMDbDracula
519192459604394000,Mon Oct 06 18:28:23 +0000 2014,RT @IMDb: Did u feel pressure taking on an iconic character? @AmberMaher @TheRealLukevans #IMDbDracula
519192123015704600,Mon Oct 06 18:27:02 +0000 2014,.@jessenika The fight sequences took a lot of work. Months of training. Most emotionally demanding was final scene with Mirena #IMDbDracula
519191793963782140,Mon Oct 06 18:25:44 +0000 2014,RT @IMDb: What scene was the most physically or mentally demanding? @jessenika  @TheRealLukevans @SarahGadon #IMDbDracula
519191513352642560,Mon Oct 06 18:24:37 +0000 2014,.@dirtygoId it's the origin story of the most famous vampire. It's the story that no one knows. Dracula UNTOLD #IMDbDracula
519191336210432000,Mon Oct 06 18:23:55 +0000 2014,RT @IMDb: What differentiates Dracula Untold from other Dracula movies? @dirtygoId @SarahGadon @TheRealLukevans #IMDbDracula
519191067946934300,Mon Oct 06 18:22:51 +0000 2014,.@vampgirl27 that it's the human story and not the vampire. Do you know the human story? #IMDbDracula
519190608804864000,Mon Oct 06 18:21:01 +0000 2014,RT @IMDb: What attracted you the roles of Vlad and Mirena? @vampgirl27 @TheRealLukevans @SarahGadon #IMDbDracula
